Letter from Queen Navari:
Do you still remember that strange fragment you found last time?
There are still more kind of this fragment near the area around Cruma Tower, an ancient ruin since The Giant's Glory Age. I need you to go there and investigate.

For more details, first you have to find High Priest Sylvian at Einhasad's Temple in Town of Dion.
